mapper.insert: SELECT TTY_PO_TASK_RELEVANCE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO tty_po_task_relevance(ID,TASK_ID,TASK_PERSON_ID,IS_PARENT,TASK_TYPE,DELETE_FLAG) VALUES (#{id},#{taskId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{taskPersonId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{isParent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{taskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_po_task_relevance
TASK_ID=#{taskId},
TASK_PERSON_ID=#{taskPersonId},
IS_PARENT=#{isParent},
TASK_TYPE=#{taskType},
DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag}
where ID = #{id}
